Name: lithium fluoride production | lithium fluoride | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: This dataset includes a method of producing lithium fluoride out of lithium carbonate and hydrogen fluoride under ambient conditions (no heating, no cooling, no pressure). Lithium carbonate conversion is 95.5%.
